column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ An unidentified foreign male was found lying dead in a small water feature on the morning of December 1
column4: 2019 near AEON 1 in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column6: Phnom Penh.------UPDATE: Later reports say he wasn’t dead but (to quote Monty Python) just sleeping. Apologies for wrong information.------More details will be released later. *He appears to be Asian in his late 20’s/early 30’s
column7: but no more information as yet. Images from the scene ------HERE
